name: Get Away From My human
description:
BEGIN TRANSMISSION;

STATUS OF SHIP: IN PIECES;

LOCATION OF SHIP: EVERYWHERE;

STATUS OF HUMAN: HIBERNATING;

LOCATION OF HUMAN: UNCONQUERED PLANET (X-7331);

HOSTILE LIFEFORMS DETECTED;

NEW OBJECTIVE: KILL ALL;

END OF TRANSMISSION;

/*----------------------------------------*/
[Controls]

Move:  [W][A][S][D] or [↑][←][↓][→]
Aim:   Mouse
Shoot: [LMB]
Pause: [ESC] or [P]
/*----------------------------------------*/

[Change Log]

Version 1.1:

  • The weapon will keep firing while holding down the button;
  • The player can also be controlled by the arrow keys;
  • Fixed issue where the pause menu was invisible;
  • Fixed "Quit" buttons appearing in the web build.
